Um isn't the reason this download is 7.21GB because in order for Skidrow to update the game they need to manually update ALL the files hence the full game size?

Update v1.6 just like v1.5 which is small in size but it changes a lot of files of the main game , so skidrow just cracks all the files after they have been updated.

to sum it up

apparantly the update injection process has been changed in steam, and crack group isnt able at this time to emulate there update procedure, so they have basically altered manually every file modified by the normal steam update, this however means that every file modified is a complete replacement.

So to cut a long story short.......

This is only a update and still requires the original game installed first, then this will replace most of the existing files with "patched modified versions" of the same.

Example: if the sub 200mb steam update inserts one line of code into a 1gb file then SkidRow have to replace the whole 1gb file.
